text: Ameristar Casino Hotel Vicksburg is a riverboat casino located in Vicksburg, Mississippi on the Mississippi River. It is owned by Gaming and Leisure Properties and operated by Penn National Gaming. The property includes 70,000 sq. ft. of gaming space, 149 hotel rooms, over 1,400 slot machines, and 30 table games. title: Ameristar Casino Vicksburg
